title: Desire for Two
description: [Menage Amour: Erotic Cowboy Menage a Trois Romance, M/F/M] Brothers Clay and Elliot Middleton are looking for an administrative assistant when they hire Desire for the job, but what they end up with is a passionate woman intent on keeping it all about business. Desire wants the prestigious position, but it comes with two hunky men. When they ask her to return to their hometown to help design their new home, will she succumb to their allure or pass on the passion they promise to give her? Clay and Elliot both know she's the one for them, but she thinks they're just using her. When the time comes to admit what they want, will it be too late to save her desire for two? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Marla Monroe
